resources.string: "The security awareness videos in this section are great material to learn about the possible dangers of certain cyber attacks." "They also provide methods of how to recognise and defend such attacks." "\n\nA special thanks goes to the security awareness company AwareGo for providing their security awareness videos."

"You can infect your computer with ransomware by various means, like opening an attachment or updating your computer from an untrustworthy source and it can be very expensive to recover your files." \n"

"Vishing is the telephone equivalent of phishing. It is described as the act of using the telephone in an attempt to scam the user into surrendering private information that will be used for identity theft." \n
"Documents, memos, emails and contacts can be stolen if you leave your phone unlocked. It is important to guard the information. Always keep your phone locked when you’re not using it. \n"
"It‘s not just the equipment I‘m after, all of your secrets are now my secrets and all I had to do was smile. \n"
"Every day 8 million people open a fraudulent phishing email, don‘t add to that number. \n"
"A website starting with HTTPS is encrypted website is much safer. Watch this security awareness video about HTTPS to understand better the threats. \n"

"Don’t be a victim: 
" " • Someone might have studied your hobbies and/or job function 
 " " • And and he might send you an email that looks legitimate 
 " " • Malware in links or attachments might have severe consequences if you open them 
 "
"Check your computer ports regularly for unknown devices."
"Make sure your home WiFi is secure."
"Now the perpetrator can see everything you do on your computer, work related and personal."
"All mail is not necessarily good mail."
"Now I can buy whatever I want, using your money."
"So many people take the convenient path of writing down their passwords and hiding them by their desks, that’s very convenient, especially for me."
